00020   TempRootTreeGenerator aTempRootTreeGenerator;
00021     
00022   map<TTree*, TempRootTreeGenerator*> TempRootTreeGenerator::_treeFillerMap;
00023   map<TTree*, TempRootTreeGenerator*> TempRootTreeGenerator::_treeOwnerMap;
00024   map<TFile*, TempRootTreeGenerator*> TempRootTreeGenerator::_fileOwnerMap;
00025     
00026   TempRootTreeGenerator::TempRootTreeGenerator() : Processor("TempRootTreeGenerator")
00027   {
00028     _description = "Processor to generate root tree with Event built";
00029         
00030     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00031                                "Name of the input collection of TempSensorData",
00032                                _inputColName,
00033                                std::string("TemperatureSensor"));
00034         
00035     registerProcessorParameter("OutputRootFileName",
00036                                "Name of the output root file",
00037                                _rootFileName,
00038                                std::string("Temperature.root"));
00039 
00040     registerProcessorParameter("BranchPrefix",
00041                                "Name of the prefix of the branch",
00042                                _prefix,
00043                                std::string(""));
00044 
00045         
00046   }
00047     
00048   TempRootTreeGenerator::~TempRootTreeGenerator() {}
00049     
00050   void TempRootTreeGenerator::init()
00051   {
00052     runNumber = 0;
00053     eventNumber = 0;
00054     Timestamp = 0;
00055 
00056     _rootFile = gROOT->GetFile(_rootFileName.c_str());
00057     if ( _rootFile == NULL )
00058       {
00059         _rootFile      = new TFile(_rootFileName.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00060         _fileOwnerMap[ _rootFile ] = this;
00061       }
00062         
00063     _rootFile->cd();
00064     _treeTempSensorBlock = dynamic_cast<TTree*>( _rootFile->Get("TemperatureSensor"));
00065         
00066     if ( _treeTempSensorBlock != NULL )
00067       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Reuse tree ["<< "TemperatureSensor" <<"] " << endl;
00068     if ( _treeTempSensorBlock == NULL )
00069       {
00070         _treeTempSensorBlock = new TTree( "TemperatureSensor" , "all information");
00071         _treeOwnerMap[_treeTempSensorBlock] = this;
00072       }
00073         
00074     bool firstProcessor = (_treeFillerMap[ _treeTempSensorBlock ] == NULL );
00075     _treeFillerMap[ _treeTempSensorBlock ] = this;
00076         
00077     if ( firstProcessor )
00078       {
00079         _treeTempSensorBlock->Branch( "eventNumber", &eventNumber, "EventNumber/I");
00080         _treeTempSensorBlock->Branch( "runNumber", &runNumber, "RunNumber/I");
00081         _treeTempSensorBlock->Branch( "Timestamp", &Timestamp, "Timestamp/L");
00082       }
00083         
00084     registerBranches(_treeTempSensorBlock);
00085   }
00086     
00087   void TempRootTreeGenerator::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00088   {
00089     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "nLayers").c_str(), &_hFill.nLayers,  string(_prefix+"nLayers/I").c_str());
00090     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "T1").c_str(), &_hFill.T1, string(_prefix+"T1["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00091     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "T2").c_str(), &_hFill.T2, string(_prefix+"T2["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00092     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "T3").c_str(), &_hFill.T3, string(_prefix+"T3["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00093     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "T4").c_str(), &_hFill.T4, string(_prefix+"T4["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00094     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "T5").c_str(), &_hFill.T5, string(_prefix+"T5["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00095     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "T6").c_str(), &_hFill.T6, string(_prefix+"T6["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00096     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "TDIF").c_str(), &_hFill.TDIF, string(_prefix+"TDIF["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00097     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "TPWR").c_str(), &_hFill.TPWR, string(_prefix+"TPWR["+_prefix+"nLayers]/F").c_str() );
00098 
00099   }
00100       
00101   void TempRootTreeGenerator::processEvent(LCEvent* evt)
00102   {
00103     LCCollection* col ;
00104     try
00105       {
00106         //fetch Labview data raw collection
00107         col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName ) ;
00108 
00109         runNumber   = evt->getRunNumber();
00110         eventNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00111         Timestamp   = evt->getTimeStamp();//needs to be long64
00112         //Timestamp= col->getParameters().getIntVal("Timestamp_i");//TimeStamp();//airqui                                                                                         
00113         streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<"runNumber= "<<runNumber<<" eventNumber= "<<eventNumber<<" Timestamp= "<< Timestamp<<endl;
00114         nLayers = 0;
00115           
00116         for(int ielm = 0; ielm < col->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00117           {
00118             LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00119             TempSensorBlock2 lBlock(obj);
00120             //      std::cout<<col->getNumberOfElements()<<endl;
00121             float t1=lBlock.GetT1()/10.;
00122             float t2=lBlock.GetT2()/10.;
00123             float t3=lBlock.GetT3()/10.;
00124             float t4=lBlock.GetT4()/10.;
00125             float t5=lBlock.GetT5()/10.;
00126             float t6=lBlock.GetT6()/10.;
00127             float tdif=lBlock.GetTDIF();
00128             float tpwr=lBlock.GetTPWR();
00129 
00130             streamlog_out(MESSAGE) << "Temperatures : " << t1 << " " << t2 << " " << t3 << " " << t4 << " " << t5 << " " << t6 << " " << tdif << " " << tpwr << endl;
00131 
00132             _hFill.T1[nLayers] = t1;
00133             _hFill.T2[nLayers] = t2;
00134             _hFill.T3[nLayers] = t3;
00135             _hFill.T4[nLayers] = t4;
00136             _hFill.T5[nLayers] = t5;
00137             _hFill.T6[nLayers] = t6;
00138             _hFill.TDIF[nLayers] = tdif;
00139             _hFill.TPWR[nLayers] = tpwr;
00140            
00141             nLayers ++;
00142 
00143           }
00144                   
00145         _hFill.nLayers = nLayers;
00146    
00147       
00148         if ( _treeFillerMap[_treeTempSensorBlock] == this )
00149           {
00150             TFile* oldfile = _treeTempSensorBlock->GetCurrentFile();
00151             _treeTempSensorBlock->Fill();
00152             TFile* newfile = _treeTempSensorBlock->GetCurrentFile();
00153             if (oldfile!=newfile)
00154               {
00155                 TempRootTreeGenerator* owner = _fileOwnerMap[oldfile];
00156                 _fileOwnerMap.erase( oldfile );
00157                 _fileOwnerMap[newfile]=owner;
00158               }
00159           }
00160       }
00161     catch (  DataNotAvailableException err )
00162       {
00163         //          std::cout <<  "TempRootTreeGenerator WARNING: Collection "<< _inputColName
00164         //       << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00165         return;
00166       }
00167         
00168   }
00169     
00170   void TempRootTreeGenerator::end()
00171   {
00172         
00173     if ( _treeOwnerMap[_treeTempSensorBlock] == this )
00174       {
00175         TFile* treeFile = _treeTempSensorBlock->GetCurrentFile();       
00176         treeFile->Write();
00177         delete _treeTempSensorBlock;
00178         _treeTempSensorBlock=NULL;
00179       }
00180         
00181     if ( _fileOwnerMap[_rootFile] == this )
00182       {
00183         _rootFile->Write();
00184         _rootFile->Close();
00185         //delete _outFile;
00186         _rootFile=NULL;
00187       }
00188   }
00189     
00190   const double TempRootTreeGenerator::INVALID = -FLT_MAX;
00191     
00192 }
